post.text:
Join us LIVE at 6:30pmE! Our nightly campaign coverage from Trump Tower!

This is a HISTORIC movement. Together, we will once again make a government by, for, and of the people! Help us close out the final weeks of this campaign strong and WIN.
Contribute $10 Now >> www.DonaldJTrump.com/Live

comment.author: Ashton
comment.text: I'm a deplorable from New Hampshire surrounded by rich liberals voting for Clinton.. I wish New Hampshire would wake up and make the right decision

replies.author: Ashton
replies.text: You are also voting for a corrupt liar, hypocrite that can't tell the truth which go after our rights as law abiding citizens including our freedom of speech the right to bear arms big mistake but you choose to vote for the wrong person who will destroy our country.. also an FYI polls change too by the way Clinton just has a 5 point lead in the polls.. plus today isn't Election Day so if I were you I wouldn't go making predictions so quickly..

replies.author: Robert
replies.text: Stop the Voting Dead: Contact your local Registrar of Voters office. A Notification from a family member, including the name, address & date of death of the deceased is all that is necessary is the way I understand it.
